item.title: Tex2Rmd--A package I developed in C++ and Java to covert Latex document to R markdown and via knitr to html and docx
item.description:
A software package I developed in C++ and Java that converts a Latex document to the Rmarkdown format. The converted markdown document, possibly after further addition of other features and edits, can be converted to the html and word formats using R package knitr. For details how to use and where to get it, follow this link: Tex2Rmd and for a short guide here Tex2Rmd-a short guide

To download it and to see a live demo on what it does, you can go directly to Tex2Rmd Github distribution page of the project.
